title: The Authority shall have right to remove any unauthorized construction in the property enlisted as heritage property and recover the expenses of such removal/ demolition work from the owner as per provisions of the Act
clause_text: The Authority shall have right to remove any unauthorized construction in the property enlisted as heritage property and recover the expenses of such removal/ demolition work from the owner as per provisions of the Act.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
